text: Science is one of the world's top academic journals. It is a peer-reviewed journal about science, published weekly. The publisher is the American Association for the Advancement of Science. It is also referred to as Science magazine. Science was founded by John Michaels in 1880 with financial support from Thomas Edison and later from Alexander Graham Bell. == Related pages == *Nature *The Lancet ==References== ==Other websites== *Magazine website Category:Science and technology magazines Category:American weekly magazines Category:Scientific journals
title: Science (journal)
